title.narrative: Fostering an inclusive and participatory public policy environment

description.narrative:
Building peaceful and inclusive societies depends on public policies that are derived from evidence and which seek to promote state obligations to respect, protect and fulfil human rights. Building peaceful and inclusive societies also requires that the voices and concerns of vulnerable and marginalized groups are captured in research evidence and utilized in decision and policymaking processes that concern them.
UNESCO will support Member States in the East Asia region and other stakeholders to improve multidisciplinary and multistakeholder policymaking through [enhancing/establishing a research-policy interface which is informed by social science research and knowledge on women, notably elderly women including those with disabilities, and serves to empower these population groups.
